title: Looking for a duo player that can mess around with.
body:
I'm looking at learning Jungling while messing around in Draft which means no tilt or hate if you decide to add me. I'm simple just want to have fun games with player that will join in. 
I'm looking to take learn jungling serious but i will mess up because i'm new to the position so don't blame me because i'm still learning üëç let's just have fun.

replies.body: Yeah Im down normals/ draft are just fun to fun game modes
